knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)

```{r}
library(igraph)
nodes = read.csv('Dataset1-Media-Example-NODES.csv')
edges = read.csv('Dataset1-Media-Example-EDGES.csv')
dirnet = graph_from_data_frame(edges,nodes,directed = T)
undirnet = graph_from_data_frame(edges,nodes,directed = F)
```

```{r}
plot(dirnet)
```

```{r}
plot(dirnet,vertex.color = 'yellow', vertex.frame.color = 'orange',vertex.shape = 'sphere',vertex.size = 12.5, vertex.label = nodes$media, vertex.label.font = 3 , vertex.label.cex = .75,vertex.label.color = 'black',vertex.label.dist = 1, vertex.label.degree = -pi/2,edge.color = 'red', edge.arrow.size = .25,edge.arrow.width = .5,edge.lty = 'dotted',edge.curved = 1, main = 'Directed Network')
```

```{r}
plot(undirnet)
```

```{r}
plot(undirnet,vertex.color = 'purple', vertex.frame.color = 'blue',vertex.shape = 'square',vertex.size = 10, vertex.label = nodes$media, vertex.label.font = 2 , vertex.label.cex = .75,vertex.label.color = 'black',vertex.label.dist = 1, vertex.label.degree = -pi/2,edge.color = 'blue', edge.lty = 'twodash',edge.curved = 0,main = 'Undirected Network')
```

```{r}
plot(dirnet, vertex.size = nodes$audience.size,edge.width = edges$weight)
plot(undirnet,vertex.size = nodes$audience.size,edge.width = edges$weight)
```

```{r}
V(dirnet)$size = nodes$audience.size/2
V(undirnet)$size = nodes$audience.size/2
E(dirnet)$width = edges$weight/5
E(undirnet)$width = edges$weight/5

plot(dirnet, vertex.size = nodes$audience.size/2, vertex.color = 'purple', vertex.label = nodes$media,vertex.label.font = 2, vertex.label.cex = .5, vertex.label.color = 'black',vertex.label.dist = 0,edge.width = edges$weight/5,edge.color = 'blue', edge.arrow.width = 0, main = 'Directed Network' )
plot(undirnet, vertex.size = nodes$audience.size/2, vertex.color = 'purple', vertex.label = nodes$media,vertex.label.font = 2, vertex.label.cex = .5, vertex.label.color = 'black',vertex.label.dist = 0,edge.width = edges$weight/5,edge.color = 'blue', edge.arrow.width = 0, main = 'Undirected Network' )
```
